title: Text Watchface
summary: A watch face for your Android Wear smartwatch which tells you the time in words
description: A watch face for your Android Wear smartwatch which tells you the time in words.This watchface is optimized for the LG G Watch and G Watch R (but might work fine on other watches, let me know if you have any problems)Features:* Watchface for Android Wear watches* Languages: English (more will be added soon)If the watchface doesn't show up on your watch immediatly, resync applications in the Android Wear app settings or wait a few minutes. You can change watchfaces with a long press on your current watchface or in the settings on your watch.
descriptionHTML:
A watch face for your Android Wear smartwatch which tells you the time in words.This watchface is optimized for the LG G Watch and G Watch R (but might work fine on other watches, let me know if you have any problems)

Features:
* Watchface for Android Wear watches
* Languages: English (more will be added soon)

If the watchface doesn't show up on your watch immediatly, resync applications in the Android Wear app settings or wait a few minutes. You can change watchfaces with a long press on your current watchface or in the settings on your watch.
comments: Terrible on Huawei Watch Occupies less than half the screen. Shame
Last update broke alignment Used to look perfect on my Moto 360, the latest update makes the bottom line of text misaligned with the other lines.
date Please allow a date option!
Moto360 Pls update for moto360 then it will be 5 stars
Great concept! Configuration could be a bit more clear and option-full, but I'd probably want black-and-white anyway. I'd love to add new languages too! Especially Swiizerduutch ;-)
recentChanges: I'm starting to work on a version based on the new Watchface API. This version is not finished yet, but the old version is no longer allowed on Google Play.
Currently only supports english until I add configuration again. Tested on the LG G Watch and the G Watch R. Please send me a message with a picture/screenshot if you have problems on your device.
2.0.2: Hotfix for missing wakelock permission (this is needed for all watchfaces)
